title: UFC, David Stern, Michael Jordan, NBA season, where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: UFC, David Stern, Michael Jordan, NBA season, where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin explains why it was a great weekend for the UFC, laughs at conspiracy theorists while defending David Stern, explains Michael Jordan's mentality throughout his career, and talks about why he disagrees with Shaquille O'neal's comments on canceling the NBA season. Also, Colin discusses where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, David Falk, Tim Grover, and Jamal Crawford.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
